name: Samurai Fight
description:
Leader as an army of Samurai, Ninjas, and fantastic monsters of the East to glory! Raise powerful armies! Fight against enemies!


Samurai Fight ape is a fun fighting game. Defend yourself against shruiken from enemy ninjas, samurai, and creatures! Explore a mystical world as you battle through lush forests, snowy mountains, and deserts. Fight other players from around the world to capture loot and steal rare items.


FEATURES
* Amazing game graphics!
* 4 mode provided, how many shruiken can you kill
* Easy to play but challenging
* Rid the world of evil as you travel across a vast world map
* Fight in multiple environments
